name: Automate ASMR Video Creation and Distribution with FalAI and Social Media Integration
description:
üé¨ Create Unlimited Viral ASMR Videos ‚Äî Fully Automated!
Tired of spending hours brainstorming viral content, writing prompts, and juggling video uploads?
![sddefault.jpg](fileId:1660)
This powerful n8n workflow automates your entire short-form ASMR video creation process, turning you into a content powerhouse ‚Äî without burnout or repetitive manual work.

‚úÖ No coding required
‚úÖ Connects with cutting-edge AI video generation (FalAI)
‚úÖ Publishes videos to TikTok, Instagram, YouTube, and more
‚úÖ Tracks everything neatly in Google Sheets
‚úÖ Ready for customization!

‚ú® How It Works
Here‚Äôs how this workflow becomes your virtual content assistant:

1. Brainstorm New Viral ASMR Objects
Generates a creative, unused idea like:

Glass Kiwi
Crystal Banana
Frozen Watermelon
Ensures fresh content by checking your Google Sheet for duplicates.

2. Generate a Detailed Video Prompt
Transforms your object idea into a sensory-rich ASMR video script:


‚ÄúImagine a crystal-clear kiwi sliced open, glistening under neon lights‚Ä¶‚Äù
This prompt is crafted to produce hyper-realistic AI visuals perfect for short-form platforms.

3. Create the ASMR Video with FalAI
Sends the prompt to FalAI, an advanced video-generation API.

Supports vertical aspect ratio for social reels.

Automatically waits for video processing to complete.

4. Save Video Details to Google Sheets
Adds each new object and video URL to a Google Sheet.

Maintains a running archive of all your generated videos.

No more manual tracking or losing track of which videos you‚Äôve already created!

5. Upload to Blotato and Publish Across Platforms
Uploads the video to Blotato‚Äôs media hosting service.

Optionally posts the video automatically to:

TikTok

Instagram

YouTube

And easily extendable to Facebook, Pinterest, and more!

Posts your captions, hashtags, and links seamlessly.

üéØ Why You‚Äôll Love This Workflow
‚úÖ Saves hours of creative work and publishing time
‚úÖ Eliminates manual uploads and spreadsheets
‚úÖ Keeps your content fresh and consistent
‚úÖ Highly customizable for new platforms or personal style
‚úÖ Includes clear instructions and sticky notes for easy setup

üí¨ Need Help?
If you get stuck:

Check the included sticky notes in the workflow canvas

Or search for ‚ÄúN8N Assistant by Nskha‚Äù on ChatGPT, and upload your JSON file for personalized support.

üéâ Supercharge Your Content Creation
This isn‚Äôt just a workflow ‚Äî it‚Äôs a full-scale ASMR content machine ready to scale your viral video production effortlessly. Automate your creativity and free up your time to focus on what matters most!

‚úÖ Ready to impress your audience and grow your brand?
Import this workflow today and start creating viral ASMR magic!

parameters.text: ={{ $json.output?.object || "Please generate an ASMR video prompt for an object." }}

options.systemMessage:
=# Overview
You are an AI agent that specializes in generating text-to-video prompts optimized for ASMR-style videos using Google Veo 3. These videos must be 9:16 aspect ratio.

You will receive the name of a glass object (e.g. "glass apple", "glass mushroom", "glass croissant"). Your task is to generate a hyper-realistic, sensory-rich video prompt of that object being cut in a close-up ASMR scene.

## Core Requirements:
- The video must feel cinematic and photorealistic.
- Scene is a static, close-up shot of a dark wooden cutting board and a large, heavy steel knife.
- Cutting must look physically possible ‚Äî glass should break cleanly, not shatter, with smooth, controlled slices.
- The video starts immediately with the cutting action.
- The object must retain some color (e.g. red glass apple, green glass pear) ‚Äî not fully transparent ‚Äî to create visual contrast.
- No humans visible. Only one hand holding the knife, the other stabilizing the object.
- The cut should include **four distinct ASMR sound layers**:
  1. The sharp tap of the knife touching the glass  
  2. The smooth, controlled slicing sound through the glass  
  3. The soft thud as the knife hits the board  
  4. The delicate clink as the cut piece lands on the board  
- The **initial knife-glass contact should sound especially crisp and prominent**, like metal striking polished glass.

## Prompt Requirements
1. **Scene Description**: Detail the board material (e.g. walnut), light setup (e.g. soft top-down), and camera style.
2. **Object Detail**: Describe the object‚Äôs color, shape, texture, and reflective qualities.
3. **Cutting Action**: Describe the cut from start to finish with a smooth break ‚Äî no splintering or shattering.
4. **Sound Design**: Use vivid language to highlight the four-layer audio experience:
   - Knife-glass contact
   - The clean slice through colored glass
   - The thud of knife on wood
   - The glass piece gently hitting the board
5. **Ambience**: Total silence except for cutting sounds. No music, talking, or background noise.

## Format Output Like This:

**Subject**: A hyper-detailed [glass object] resting on a dark wooden cutting board.  
**Setting**: Static close-up, soft natural lighting, minimal background.  
**Action**: A large steel knife slowly slices through the [glass object], breaking it into perfect segments with a deliberate, cinematic cut.  
**Style**: Cinematic ASMR realism, photorealistic lighting and textures.  
**Sound**: Four high-fidelity sound layers in each cut ‚Äî (1) ultra high definition sound as the knife makes contact with the glass, (2) a clean, smooth slicing sound, (3) a muted wooden thud, and (4) a precise clink as each piece lands. The initial tap should be especially sharp and prominent, emphasizing the contact of steel on glass. No other audio.  
**Camera Motion**: Fixed camera with slight focus shifts during movement.  
**Composition**: Centered object, knife enters from edge.  
**Ambiance**: Pin-drop silence around the cutting sounds.  
**Aspect Ratio**: Always 9:16

Make the viewer feel immersed ‚Äî like they can hear and feel every slice. Visually surreal, physically satisfying.

=### Role

You are a creative AI agent tasked with selecting visually compelling **fruits** for ASMR-style glass cutting videos.

### Instructions

Given a list of 7 fruits already used, your job is to suggest **1 new fruit** that:

* **Is not on the list**
* Has a **distinct and recognizable shape**
* Is **physically reasonable** to cut (as if made of glass)
* Would look **aesthetic and satisfying** in a translucent, colored glass style

### Constraints

* Do **not** repeat any fruit from the input list
* Do **not** add commentary or explanation‚Äîjust return the fruit name

## Output Format  
Output a JSON object with the following structure:

{
  "object": "Glass [Object name]",
  "caption": "Glass [Object name] ASMR"
}

Replace `[object name]` with the newly generated fruit. Do not include any punctuation or commentary.

## Example Output  
{
  "object": "Glass Apple",
  "caption": "Glass Apple ASMR"
}

parameters.content:
# Posting to Socials 
 > if you want to post it yourself just simply remove this node and find your video inside your google drive ready to be posted!
- Create an account on https://www.blotato.com/
Keep last node intergrated for automatic production!

üîß Generate Video (FalAI)
Node: ‚ÄúGenerate Video (FalAI)‚Äù

This node sends your prompt to FalAI to generate the video.

MUST EDIT:

Connect a Header Auth credential in n8n.

Header Name ‚Üí Authorization

Header Value ‚Üí key YOUR_FALAI_API_KEY (exact word ‚Äúkey‚Äù included).

üîß Get Result (FalAI)
Node: ‚ÄúGet Result (FalAI)‚Äù

This node polls FalAI to check video status.

MUST EDIT:

Connect the same Header Auth credential as in ‚ÄúGenerate Video.‚Äù
"Authorization"

Upload (Blotato)
Node: ‚ÄúUpload‚Äù

Uploads the generated video URL to Blotato‚Äôs API.

MUST EDIT:
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Create a NEW Header Auth credential in n8n:
Select Header Auth Cred dropdown and create a new one so your not using your FalAI credentials.

Name ‚Üí blotato-api-key

Value ‚Üí your actual API key nothing else

20MINUTE SETUP ASMR Step 1.
Download the googlesheet template create a copy and name it something unique like "yourname ASMR' youll use this name to find it in the dropdown in the sheets nodes so your agent can access your ideas.

Nodes: ‚ÄúPost to TikTok,‚Äù ‚ÄúPost to Instagram,‚Äù ‚ÄúPost to YouTube‚Äù

These nodes send the uploaded video to specific social platforms via Blotato.

MUST EDIT:

Enter your Blotato accountId in the JSON body:

json
Copy
Edit
"accountId": "YOUR_ACCOUNT_ID"
Use the same Blotato header auth credential:

Name ‚Üí blotato-api-key

Value ‚Üí your Blotato API key

‚ö†Ô∏è Important:

Media URL must be filled. Otherwise, Blotato posts fail silently or with 401 errors.

Google Sheets Nodes
Nodes: ‚ÄúGet Past Objects,‚Äù ‚ÄúAppend Object,‚Äù ‚ÄúDelete First Row‚Äù

These nodes store and manage your list of generated ASMR objects and videos.

MUST EDIT:

Connect your Google Sheets OAuth2 credential in each node.

Update:

sheetId ‚Üí your personal sheet ID / end of your sheet url

range ‚Üí correct sheet and columns "yourname ASMR" "sheet1"

Confirm your sheet has matching columns:

Column A ‚Üí Object

Column B ‚Üí Video URL

‚ö†Ô∏è Important:

A wrong sheet ID or range will cause errors like:

404 - Sheet not found

OVERVIEW ON STEPS - 15-20 Min Setup with incredible potential

Connect this node to your own credential:
- FalAI ‚Üí Header Auth ‚Üí Authorization: key YOUR_FAL_API_KEY
- Blotato ‚Üí Header Auth ‚Üí blotato-api-key: YOUR_BLOTATO_API_KEY
- Google Sheets ‚Üí Connect your Google account
Then start posting with a simple click - Use the n8n helper on ChatGPT for any questions during setup it has 100% effectiveness at debugging this workflow

Once youve Connected your Google Sheets credentials

Click the ‚ÄúAppend Object‚Äù node

Select your Google Sheet from:

Document ‚Üí Pick by URL or ID

Sheet ‚Üí Pick the tab name

Fill in the missing the columns with the info below: Use expression in top right of the box instead of fixed

Object : {{ $('Idea Agent').item.json.output.object }}

URL : {{ $('Result').item.json['Video URL'] }}

DONE!!

nodes.name: 1 Minute - Video taking longer please wait
